## Gizmos class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Enables gizmos in the entity. Gizmos only work in EDITOR, PREVIEW or DEBUG modes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Gizmos extends ObservableComponent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cycle](./decentraland-ecs.gizmos.cycle.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Cycle through gizmos using click. |
|  [localReference](./decentraland-ecs.gizmos.localreference.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Align the gizmos to match the local reference system |
|  [position](./decentraland-ecs.gizmos.position.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Enable position gizmo |
|  [rotation](./decentraland-ecs.gizmos.rotation.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Enable rotation gizmo |
|  [scale](./decentraland-ecs.gizmos.scale.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Enable scale gizmo |
|  [selectedGizmo](./decentraland-ecs.gizmos.selectedgizmo.md) |  | <code>Gizmo</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> If cycle is false, this will be the selected gizmo |
